RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: This Level 1C data product measured over multiple scans on the disk contains data directly measure by the sensors such as photometer counts, uncertainties, light intensities and pointing information derived from the GUVI raw sensor data and the TIMED Satellite ephemeris data. The data are geolocated at a 150 km altitude, then gridded and binned to a 25 km X 25 km resolution GUVI-based coordinate system consisting of the along orbit position of the sensor and the angle of the scan from the nadir position. This gridding eliminates overlap from scan to scan due to the large instantaneous field-of-view of GUVI (about 12 degrees) and involves coaddition to place the values on a uniform instrument shared grid. The data is then determined whether its from day, night, aurora or twilight pixels.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC Imaging L1C Data Request
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of data files for this product. To request data: select the year and day then press display.

Parameter.Name: Starting Time
Parameter.Description: Starting date/time of file's observation encoded in a 13-digit string and stored as a single netCDF global attribute.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [1] - this parameter is a single element per file.

Parameter.Name: Stopping Time
Parameter.Description: Stopping date/time of file's observation encoded in a 13-digit string and stored as a single netCDF global attribute.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [1] - this parameter is a single element per file.

Parameter.Name: Day of Year
Parameter.Description: Date of observation in number of days since start of current year.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumPhiBins] - where NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Description: Time of observation in number of milliseconds since start of current day. Timestamp marks beginning of interval

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumPhiBins] - where NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.
Dimensions: [NumPhiBins] - where NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Slit position
Parameter.Description: Slit position being used where 0 = closed, 1 = wide, 2 = medium, 3 = narrow, and 4 = unknown.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumPhiBins] - where NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Geographic Latitude
Parameter.Description: Geographic latitude of pixel center of 25-km x 25-km bin

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Geographic Longitude
Parameter.Description: Geographic longitude of pixel center of 25-km x 25-km bin

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Geomagnetic Latitude
Parameter.Description: Geomagnetic latitude of pixel center of 25-km x 25-km bin

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Geomagnetic Longitude
Parameter.Description: Geomagnetic longitude of pixel center of 25-km x 25-km bin

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Imaging Mode Disk Radiance Data
Parameter.Description: Radiance of each of 5 colors (1216, 1304, 1356 A, LBH1 and LBH2) has been geolocated at a 150 km altitude, gridded and binned to a 25 km X 25 km resolution.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,2,NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where 5 is the nmber of colors (NumColors); 2 is the number of rectification types (NumRectificationTypes); NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.
Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.
Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Data Region
Parameter.Description: Data Region where Bit 0: Dayside 0°<SZA<90°; Bit 1: Nightside 110°<SZA<180°; Bit 2: Twilight 90°<SZA<110°; Bit 3: Polar Region 50° < Geomaglat < 90°; Bit 4: Equatorial Region 0°< Geomaglat <50°; Bit 5,6: Unused; Bit 7: Unknown region. Valid values are [1 = daylight; 2 = night; 4 = twilight; 8 = Polar; 9 = Daylight Polar; 10 = Night Polar; 12 = Twilight polar; 16 = Equatorial; 17 = Daylight equatorial; 18 = night equatorial; 20 = twilight equatorial; 128 = Geolocation error]

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Indicator
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Indicator stored as bit-encoded integers where Bits 0-6 are unused; Bit 7: 1 = No Data, 0 = Valid Pixel Data.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Systematic Error
Parameter.Description: Systematic uncertainty where values of NaNs are given if there is no pixel data

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,2,NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where 5 is the nmber of colors (NumColors); 2 is the number of rectification types (NumRectificationTypes); NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Statistical Error
Parameter.Description: Statistical uncertainty where values of NaNs are given if there is no pixel data

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,2,NumThetaBins,NumPhiBins] - where 5 is the nmber of colors (NumColors); 2 is the number of rectification types (NumRectificationTypes); NumThetaBins is the number of across-track bins (nominally 119); NumPhiBins is the number of along-track bins (nominally 1647) in an orbital file.
